mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.tech_id AS "techId", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_dispatch( id, order_id, tech_id, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{techId}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_dispatch SET order_id = #{orderId}, tech_id = #{techId}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
